description:
At Brett Steinberg Law, we take pride in being the voice of everyday Florida residents in Palm Beach Gardens. If you are injured in an accident, on business premises or at work, insurance companies and their clients begin negotiations with attorneys on their side. To ensure that you have a fair chance of receiving compensation for your injuries, you deserve to have an experienced law office representing you.

The Cases We Handle

We are primarily known for our personal injury cases and successes. When taking on these cases, we focus on representing injured or otherwise harmed parties, not big corporations and not the insurance company. These are some of the case types our law office has handled:

• Railroad worker injuries
• Brain injuries
• Dog bites
• Trucking accidents
• Medical malpractice
• Wrongful death

To better represent our clients, we have also expanded our practice areas to include criminal defense. We defend our clients against traffic tickets, DUIs and drug-related charges.

Why Choose Brett Steinberg Law

Whether you need fair compensation or experienced representation, it is important to have attorneys whose expertise you can trust. If we take your case, it is because we feel confident that we may win it. To build your own confidence in us, our law office offers free initial consultations, and we do not charge a single penny until or unless we win your case.
